name: Alderan
overview: A 3 player, Tron style arcade action game created by Wigbert Knape and Stefan Mateescu of Alive Designs and released in 1991. Music for this game done by Lars Hoff, Ole-Marius Pettersen & Stein Pedersen. The game came complete with a game level editor. You can choose a large number of worlds , the number of players and so forth, then try to keep your line from crossing itself or your opponent to win.
